text: Loudwire is an American online magazine. It makes news about rock and heavy metal musicians. It was made in 2011. Loudwire has interviewed many popular musicians, such as Metallica, Megadeth, Iron Maiden, Judas Priest, and Slipknot. The magazine hosts an awards ceremony (a show where people are given awards) named the Loudwire Music Awards. Awards are given to musicians who earn the most votes from people who read the magazine. == References == == Other websites == * Category:American magazines
title: Loudwire
